trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see langword="Command" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona datos para el evento <see langword="Command" />.

trans-unit.source: The `Command` event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control button in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> object is clicked.
trans-unit.target: El `Command` evento se desencadena cuando una <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> botón del control en un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField> se hace clic en el objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs> class is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.HandleEvent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods to access information about the event that was raised.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs> clase se utiliza internamente por la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.HandleEvent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> métodos para acceder a información sobre el evento que se ha producido.

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs> class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener una lista con los valores de propiedad iniciales de una instancia de la clase <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs>, vea el constructor <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre cómo controlar eventos, vea [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem" /> object that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem" /> que ha provocado el evento.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: Origen del evento.

trans-unit.source: The original event data that contains the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument" /> properties.
trans-unit.target: Datos de evento originales que contienen las propiedades <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName" /> y <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilice este constructor para inicializar una nueva instancia de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs> clase.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is primarily used by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: Este constructor se utiliza principalmente los programadores de controles al generar eventos.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagePropertiesChangingEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: En la siguiente tabla se muestran los valores iniciales de las propiedades de una instancia de la clase <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagePropertiesChangingEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Initial value
trans-unit.target: Valor inicial

trans-unit.source: The value of the `item` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Valor del parámetro `item`.

trans-unit.source: The value of the `commandSource` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Valor del parámetro `commandSource`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el control que provocó el evento.

trans-unit.source: The control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: El control que provocó el evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem" /> object that contains the control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem" /> que contiene el control que ha provocado el evento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem" /> object that contains the control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem" /> que contiene el control que ha provocado el evento.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs.Item%2A> property to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem> object.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldCommandEventArgs.Item%2A> propiedad que se va a recuperar el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem.PagerField%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property represents the pager field object that contains the control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem.PagerField%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad representa el objeto de campo de paginación que contiene el control que provocó el evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem.Pager%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property represents the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerFieldItem.Pager%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad representa el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager> control.
